extension.dc:title: Trait measurement score (v20140515)
extension.dc:description: Trait measurements or the so-called Characterization and Evaluation (C and E) data for plant genetic resources for food and agriculture (PGRFA). The germplasm vocabulary term g.germplasmID is a persistent identifier for the germplasm material (genebank accession, specimen, cultivar, etc that was the subject of the measurement experiment. NB! please report stable and resolvable persistent identifiers for g.germplasmID term when linking the trait measurement score to a germplasm occurrence described in an external Darwin Core archive. When linking to trait measurement descriptors and measurement trials described extenally to the Darwin Core archive, please include stable and resolvable persistent identifiers for g.measurementTraitID and g.measurementTrialID - resolving to information on each entity.
extension.name: MeasurementScore

property.name: measurementID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the MeasurementOrFact (information pertaining to measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions). May be a globally unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

property.name: measurementValue
property.dc:description: The value of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

property.name: measurementUnit
property.dc:description: The units associated with the measurementValue. Recommended best practice is to use the International System of Units (SI).

property.name: measurementAccuracy
property.dc:description: The description of the potential error associated with the measurementValue.
property.examples: 0.01; normal distribution with variation of 2 m

property.name: measurementDeterminedDate
property.dc:description: The date on which the MeasurementOrFact was made. Recommended best practice is to use an encoding scheme, such as ISO 8601_2004(E).

property.name: measurementDeterminedBy
property.dc:description: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations who determined the value of the MeasurementOrFact.
property.examples: Javier de la Torre, Julie Woodruff, Eileen Lacey

property.name: measurementType
property.dc:description: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

property.name: measurementMethod
property.dc:description: A description of or reference to (publication, URI) the method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.
property.examples: "minimum convex polygon around burrow entrances" for a home range area, "barometric altimeter" for an elevation

property.name: measurementRemarks
property.dc:description: Comments or notes accompanying the MeasurementOrFact.

property.name: germplasmID
property.dc:description: A persistent identifier for a germplasm accession maintained as part of an ex situ genebank collection. Best practice is to use a globally unique and persistent identifier (PID).

property.name: germplasmIdentifier
property.dc:description: Accession name. Either a registered or other formal designation given to the accession.

property.name: measurementTraitID
property.dc:description: Persistent identifier for a trait descriptor used to identify the description of the measurement method.

property.name: measurementTraitIdentifier
property.dc:description: Local identifier for a trait descriptor used to identify the description of the measurement method. This could be the persistent URL to an external ontology where the trait term is declared.

property.name: measurementTraitName
property.dc:description: English name used to identify the trait measurement method.
property.examples: stem rust susceptibility; powdery mildew susceptibility; plant height; ear density

property.name: measurementTrialID
property.dc:description: Persistent identifier used to identify a trait measurement trial.

property.name: measurementTrialIdentifier
property.dc:description: Unique number in the dataset for the measurement trial.
property.examples: Local identifier for the experiment or project activity

property.name: measurementByInstituteID
property.dc:description: Trait observation determined by institute code, INSTCODE. FAO WIEWS institute code for the institute performing the observation/measurement.

property.name: measurementGrowthStage
property.dc:description: The growth stage of the plant when the trait observation or measurement was made.
